title.narrative: Contribution to the Commonwealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan

description.narrative: This activity (Contribution to the Commonwealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan) is a component of The Commonwealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan 2017/18 - 2020/21 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Other bilateral donor' and a budget of £155,943,000. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Higher education. , with the following implementing partners: Commonwealth Scholarship Commission, Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy. The start date is 01-04-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

participating-org.narrative: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - post secondary non tertiary
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2021 Quarter 2
